texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.Event:StreetRequired: Street is required for offline events
texts.Event:GovernmentRequired: Government is required for offline events
texts.CityRequired: City is required for offline events
texts.StartDateInvalid: Start date must be in the future
texts.EndDateInvalid: End date must be after the start date
